review_data.title: Supervisor Asmir serves cold food refusing to exchange
review_data.content: Mcdonald's Glattzentrum. The order arrived cold, when I showed it to the supervisor Asmir, he said that it has been standing for 5 minutes. I showed him that I ordered two minutes before and he refused to exchange the order or refund. Asmir seems to...More

review_data.title: Gewohntes Angebot mit langsamem Service
review_data.content: Das Angebot ist ja bekannt, die Qualität gleichbleibend (tief?). Am Donnerstag war ich abends im Drive-Inn. Relativ lange Wartezeiten. Als...More
